text: @JoeBiden During this time of a pandemic, it’s unconscionable that G☠️P & Trump want to take affordable healthcare from Americans, esp as millions unemployed are losing their company healthcare coverage. & worse, many ins cos now consider Covid-19 infection as a preexisting condition.
